tracks.title: I Like Presents
lyrics: [Verse 1]
Cuddle up around the Christmas tree
Nowhere else but here I wanna be
Sparkle brighter than the neighbors' lights
Forget about the fighting for one night
[Pre-Chorus]
No one should be alone tonight
And I see Christmas in your eyes
So won’t you give yourself to me?
Forget those boxes 'neath the tree
[Chorus]
I like presents, yes, indeed
But you're the only thing I need
Call it selfish, call it greed
All of you for all of me
[Verse 2]
’Round this time, I always think of peace
Wish that that was something we could reach
'Cause I know this year was hard on you
So baby, let's turn in and turn off the news
[Pre-Chorus]
No one should be alone tonight
And I see Christmas in your eyes
So won't you give yourself to me?
Forget those boxes 'neath the tree
[Chorus]
I like presents, yes, indeed
But you're the only thing I need
Call it selfish, call it greed
All of you for all of me
[Outro]
All of you for all of me
All of you for all of me
All of you for all of me
All of you for all of me

tracks.title: I Won't Be Home For Christmas
lyrics: [Verse 1]
Where are you now?
I can't tell how long it's been
Since I laid eyes on you
And I don't know when I'll get to again
My heart is broken down
On the shoulder of the 110
I tried to make it
But I'm not gonna make it
[Chorus]
No, I won't be home for Christmas
Baby, tell me nothing's changed
In your heart, you feel the same
Who created all this distance?
And I know you're missing me
I don't know where I'll be
But I won't be home for Christmas
No, I won't be home for Christmas
[Verse 2]
I'm wondering now
I let you down just to do it again
An empty chair and a present with your name on it
What's left to say?
I'm the only one here to blame
I tried to make it
But I'm not gonna make it
[Chorus]
No, I won't be home for Christmas
Baby, tell me nothing's changed
In your heart, you feel the same
Who created all this distance?
And I know you're missing me
And I don't know where I'll be
But I won't be home for Christmas
No, I won't be home for Christmas
[Outro]
No, I won't be home for Christmas

tracks.title: Kiss In The Snow
lyrics: [Verse 1]
Some people don't like the cold weather, cold weather
But I'm not worried 'cause I like it better, like it better
'Cause that's the time that we get together, get together
I wanna climb inside of your sweater, your sweater
[Pre-Chorus]
You say it's freezing
And the chills are creeping in
[Chorus]
But when we get cold
We get so close
You know we kiss in the snow
I'll warm your nosе
You know we kiss in the snow
[Verse 2]
I've been impatiеnt waiting for the winter, for the winter
I like it when you hold my frozen fingers, frozen fingers
And I can't wait to taste the snow before it hits the ground
We'll find the perfect tree and cut it down
[Chorus]
But when it gets cold
We get so close
You know we kiss in the snow
I'll warm your nose
You know we kiss in the snow
[Pre-Chorus]
You say it's freezing
And the chills are creeping in
[Chorus]
But when we get cold
We get so close
You know we kiss in the snow
I'll warm your nose
You know we kiss in the snow

tracks.title: Silver Bells
lyrics: [Verse 1]
City sidewalks, busy sidewalks
Dressed in holiday style
In the air, there's a feeling of Christmas
Children laughing, people passing
Meeting smile after smile
And on every street corner, you'll hear
[Chorus]
Silver bells, silver bells
It's Christmas time in the city
Ring-a-ling, hear them ring
Soon it will be Christmas day
[Verse 2]
Strings of streetlights, even stoplights
Blink a bright red and green
As the shoppers rush home with their treasures
Hear the snow crunch, see the kids bunch
This is Santa's big scene
And above all the bustle, you'll hear
[Chorus]
Silver bells, silver bells
It's Christmas time in the city
Ring-a-ling, hear them ring
Soon it will be Christmas day
Soon it will be Christmas day
Soon it will be Christmas day
